Legal Statement:
ZeroTermux is a non-profit software developed based on Termux
Partial copyright belongs to ZeroTermux
No responsibility for any legal issues and risks, no commercial purpose
Do not use for illegal purposes!
Please comply with laws and be a good citizen,
ZeroTermux\'s original intention is to help you enter the Linux world faster and contribute to society in the future
After using it to a certain extent, it is strongly recommended that you transition to the official termux [start using after getting started] (recommended),
After all, ZT can help you for a while, but not forever!
Note: The [Delete] function in the [Switch System] feature may clear your SD card
Please disable SD card authorization before executing the [Delete] function
If your SD card, including:
Photos Videos Audio And all other data is lost due to your operation (not limited to the [Delete] function of [Switch System], this refers to all functions of ZeroTermux), you (the individual user of ZeroTermux, abbreviated as ZT) bear the responsibility
Public repository download sources are uncontrollable and not under ZeroTermux\'s control. All come from third-party repositories. ZeroTermux and its authors are not responsible for anything from third-party repository sources! \
If third-party repositories have any illegal activities/files, the authors providing the third-party repositories bear any legal responsibility! ZeroTermux and its authors do not bear any legal/other responsibilities!
License:
All functions of ZeroTermux can only be used for personal learning and communication, not for commercial purposes! and illegal uses!
All functions of ZeroTermux can only be used for personal learning and communication, not for commercial purposes! and illegal uses!
All functions of ZeroTermux can only be used for personal learning and communication, not for commercial purposes! and illegal uses!
1. This software (ZeroTermux) is open source software. You can freely distribute, copy, and modify it, but please follow the GPL license!
2. The software follows the GPL license (http://www.opensource.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.php)
3. All functions of this software (ZeroTermux) are for learning and communication use. Do not use commercially. Users (users of ZeroTermux) bear responsibility for accidental, intentional, or unintentional operations! 4. This software (ZeroTermux) is free for learning and communication use as in the first regulation. Icons and fonts in the software are from the internet. 4.1. The font is the Android default font. If you use other fonts, users (users of ZeroTermux) bear all risks and legal responsibilities. 4.2. Icons are from public icon libraries. The principle of using icons is for learning and communication, not commercial use. If there is any infringement, they will be deleted immediately. 5. Recovery packages, data packages, zip packages used in this software (ZeroTermux) have usage risks and all come from the internet. Users should use them at their discretion. If any irreparable loss is caused, users bear the risk. 6. ZeroTermux cannot control the content of all recovery packages, data packages, module packages, and zip packages. The author of this software does not bear any responsibility for any infringement in the packages. The creators of recovery packages, data packages, and zip packages bear the responsibility (tar.gz backup function legal statement). 7. Thanks to all the authors whose functions have been applied to this project. 8. Using ZeroTermux may directly or indirectly damage your device. If any irreparable loss is caused, the user bears the responsibility. This software and its authors do not bear any legal responsibility
Please read the license agreement and responsibility division carefully

Jump to ZeroTermux GITHUB page\nZeroTermux additional extension engine package

ZeroTermux is based on Termux with secondary development, added
assistance features not available in Termux for quick start
This software is equivalent to a mini Linux system, can additionally install
other distributions such as: Ubuntu, CentOS, etc.

ZeroCoreManage is an extension package based on ZeroTermux,
extends ZeroTermux functionality, purpose is to reduce ZeroTermux
package size. ZeroTermux can still run normally without this extension
Engine additional content:

1. Built-in keyboard
2. WEB access to storage card
3. X86 Alpine
Kevin Williams, KuangChiBuPangMeiBanFa, SharpIce RuiBingLong, WINLOG\nXiaoTong (XiaoTong6666), XINHAO_HAN, Xieansecn, etc. (in no particular order)

1 day = 24 hours * 60 minutes * 60 seconds = 86400 seconds

Available commands:
 ZeroTermux terminal command explanation
 Version 0.1
 
 
 --------Version 0.1 Updates--------
 
 Basic commands:
 
 help - Show help
 openleft(ol) - Open left panel
 openright(or) - Open right panel
 reboot(rb) - Restart termux
 toast - Bottom pop-up message, display custom message
 toast[
 Example: zt toast hello
 ]
 version(v) - View current version information
 
 
 Graphical connection related:
 
 vnc - Connect vnc (zt vnc address_port_username_password)
 vnc[
 Example: zt vnc 127.0.0.1_5900_admin_admin
 If username or password is empty, enter none
 Example (password empty): zt vnc 127.0.0.1_5900_admin_none
 Example (username empty): zt vnc 127.0.0.1_5900_none_admin
 Example (both empty): zt vnc 127.0.0.1_5900_none_none
 Note: Address and port cannot be empty!
 ]
 x11commandshow(x11xs) - Show terminal (x11 must be enabled)
 x11commandhide(x11xh) - Hide terminal (x11 must be enabled)
 x11keyboardshow(x11kbs) - Show x11 keyboard
 x11keyboardhide(x11kbh) - Hide x11 keyboard
 
 
 Create symbolic link
 ln - Create symbolic link
 ln[
 Description: Current directory, internal storage path
 Note: Both paths must be full paths
 Example: ln /data/data/com.termux/files/home/custom_name /sdcard/
 Example (specify a directory): ln /data/data/com.termux/files/home/custom_name /sdcard/custom_dir/
 ]
 
 
 --------Version 0.2 Updates--------
 zt dialog
 dialog[
 Usage:
 -c Confirm/cancel dialog (confirm or cancel), example: zt dialog -c -t title -m message_content
 -s Show dialog (only confirm button), example: zt dialog -s -m message_content
 -e Show edit dialog, example: zt dialog -e -t title
 ]
 
 zt x11status - Query current x11 connection status (useful for internal channel)
 
 zt backgroundimage(bgi) image_path (set current terminal background)
 backgroundimage(bgi)[
 Usage (must be full path):
 zt backgroundimage /data/data/com.termux/files/home/.img/back.jpg
 zt bgi /data/data/com.termux/files/home/.img/back.jpg
 ]

Usage:
 -c Confirm/cancel dialog (confirm or cancel), example: zt dialog -c -t title -m message_content
 -s Show dialog (only confirm button), example: zt dialog -s -m message_content
 -e Show edit dialog, example: zt dialog -e -t title
Entered background image path is invalid
